alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 7:27AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts along a cold front will impact portions of Madison, Franklin, central Crawford, southern Carroll, Sebastian, southeastern Washington and southeastern Le Flore Counties through 815 AM CST... At 723 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong wind gusts associated with showers and thunderstorms along a cold front extending from 3 miles north of Brentwood to near Jenny Lind to 3 miles west of Big Cedar. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Charleston... Huntsville... Mountainburg... Greenwood... Alma... Barling... Elkins... Lavaca... Mulberry... Mansfield... Dyer... Altus... Hartford... Huntington... Winslow... Branch... Midland... Denning... Chester... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 11 and 42. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
